articles.description: It's the first-ever superhero film for the British 75-year-old, who's a Grammy away from EGOT status
articles.content:
Dame Helen Mirren is set to play the villain Hespera, a daughter of Atlas, in her first-ever superhero film, Shazam! Fury of the Gods hitting US/UK theaters June 2, 2023.
Shazam director David F. Sa… [+2567 chars]
